Definition.WordDefinition: Pullman car \Pull"man car`\ [Named after Mr. Pullman, who introduced them.] A kind of sleeping car; also, a palace car; -- often shortened to {Pullman}. [1913 Webster]
Pullman n : luxurious passenger car; for day or night travel [syn: {Pullman car}]
